table.name: vtiger_loanapplication
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_loanapplication` (`loanapplicationid` int(11) NOT NULL, `loanapplicationno` varchar(100) default NULL, `loanapplication_tks_loanapplic` varchar(255) default NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`loanapplicationid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_loanapplicationcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_loanapplicationcf` (`loanapplicationid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`loanapplicationid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_loanapplication_user_field
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_loanapplication_user_field` (`recordid` int(25) NOT NULL, `userid` int(25) NOT NULL, `starred` varchar(100) default NULL , KEY (`vtiger_loanapplication_user_field`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
